name: venting of nitrogen, liquid | venting of nitrogen, liquid | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/11984/documentation

This activity describes venting of nitrogen into the atmosphere as an emission to air.;;Nitrogen is produced mainly as a by-product in air separation, cryogenic activity, where oxygen, liquid is produced as a reference product. Nitrogen is afterwards either vented directly into the atmosphere (Ullmann's Encyclopedia) or transformed into marketable product and sold. 

This activity describes venting of nitrogen as an emission to air.
